set(MODULE_NAME PhysX3Extensions)
set(MODULE_TYPE STATIC)#INLINE STATIC DYNAMIC 

get_filename_component(PhysXRoot "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../" ABSOLUTE)

set(HPP_FILES_RECURSE *.h *.hpp)
set(CPP_FILES ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtBroadPhase.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtClothFabricCooker.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtClothGeodesicTetherCooker.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtClothMeshQuadifier.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtClothSimpleTetherCooker.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtCollection.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtConvexMeshExt.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtCpuWorkerThread.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtD6Joint.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtD6JointSolverPrep.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtDefaultCpuDispatcher.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtDefaultErrorCallback.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtDefaultSimulationFilterShader.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtDefaultStreams.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtDistanceJoint.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtDistanceJointSolverPrep.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtExtensions.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtFixedJoint.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtFixedJointSolverPrep.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtJoint.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtMetaData.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtParticleExt.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtPrismaticJoint.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtPrismaticJointSolverPrep.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtPvd.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtPxStringTable.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtRaycastCCD.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtRevoluteJoint.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtRevoluteJointSolverPrep.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtRigidBodyExt.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtSceneQueryExt.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtSimpleFactory.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtSmoothNormals.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtSphericalJoint.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtSphericalJointSolverPrep.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/ExtTriangleMeshExt.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/SnSerialization.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/SnSerializationRegistry.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/SnSerialUtils.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Binary/SnBinaryDeserialization.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Binary/SnBinarySerialization.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Binary/SnConvX.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Binary/SnConvX_Align.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Binary/SnConvX_Convert.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Binary/SnConvX_Error.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Binary/SnConvX_MetaData.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Binary/SnConvX_Output.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Binary/SnConvX_Union.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Binary/SnSerializationContext.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Xml/SnJointRepXSerializer.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Xml/SnRepXCoreSerializer.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Xml/SnRepXUpgrader.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Xml/SnXmlSerialization.cpp
              ${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXMetaData/extensions/src/PxExtensionAutoGeneratedMetaDataObjects.cpp)

set(DEBUG_POSTFIX "DEBUG")
set(CHECKED_POSTFIX "CHECKED")
set(PROFILE_POSTFIX "PROFILE")
set(RELEASE_POSTFIX "")

set(INCLUDES_PRIVATE "${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXMetaData/core/include"
                     "${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXMetaData/extensions/include"
                     "${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src"
                     "${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Xml"
                     "${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/Binary"
                     "${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysXExtensions/src/serialization/File"
                     "${PhysXRoot}/Source/PvdSDK/src"
                     "${PhysXRoot}/Source/PhysX/src")

setup_main_module()
